messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/4/2004 10:52:49 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
ecsamhill@... writes:

said sure. He ate the first one and didn't like it. (His dad also
find Am. cheese strange, so all the slices are still in the fridge until
I toss them or figure out away to use them as a casserole ingredient.)
Anyway, tossing one pack of cheese isn't "waste", it's "learning materials".



<<<<<<<<


Melt them down with a can of Rotel tomatoes and browned ground sausage.
Serve hot with corn chips!

~Kelly
